section.title: Overview
section.p: Templates provide a way to create projects with a pre-defined structure. This can speed up project creation significantly. For example, suppose you want your newly created projects to have "Story" and "Defect" card types. You can create a new template with those card types. Any projects created based on that template will be created with the "Story" and "Defect" cards types.

section.title: How to update existing templates
section.p: You can modify and update existing templates just like how you would use Mingle projects. Any changes you made will be saved in templates.
section.hint: You can create any customize templates by updating any of existing templates.
